data.title: Abhishek Bachchan 'Liked' Post On Divorce For THIS Reason? The Real Aishwarya Rai Connection Revealed
data.meta_description: Abhishek Bachchan drew attention for liking a post discussing divorce and the increasing trend of grey divorces. It has an Aishwarya Rai connection.
data.text:
Abhishek Bachchan recently drew attention for liking a social media post discussing the difficulties of divorce and the increasing trend of grey divorces. This sparked rumours that not everything was okay between him and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. However, a fact check on Reddit has clarified why he might have liked the post. According to hawk-eyed Redditors, Abhishek liked the post because it included inputs from Dr. Zirak Marker, a close friend of Aishwarya Rai. Dr. Zirak has been a longtime friend of the actress and even appeared with her on the show Jeena Isi Ka Naam Hai” with Farooq Sheikh, many years ago.

The post, shared by authors Heena Khandelwal, featured a photo with the quote, “When love stops being easy. Couples who have been married are now parting ways. What has prompted their decision and why are grey divorces on the rise?” The picture was shared with the caption about the article on the rising divorce cases.

Meanwhile, the Bachchan family, raised eyebrows at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding recently. The red carpet saw the arrival of Bollywood’s iconic couple, Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan, accompanied by their son Abhishek Bachchan and daughter Shweta Bachchan Nanda and her husband Nikhil Nanda. Also present were their grandchildren, Navya Naveli Nanda and Agastya Nanda, who stood alongside their illustrious grandparents. However, actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who is married to Abhishek, arrived separately with her daughter Aaradhya Bachchan on both the days. However, in videos and photos from inside the wedding venue, it was revealed that Aishwarya and Aaradhya indeed reunited with Abhishek and attended the festivities together.

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who tied the knot on April 20, 2007, recently celebrated their 17th wedding anniversary with a sweet family photo on Instagram.
